BatchPutMessage.name: BatchPutMessage
BatchPutMessage.description: Sends a set of messages to the AWS IoT Events system.

BatchUpdateDetector.name: BatchUpdateDetector
BatchUpdateDetector.description: Update an detector within the AWS IoT Events system.

DescribeDetector.name: DescribeDetector
DescribeDetector.description: Returns information about the specified detector (instance).

DescribeLoggingOptions.name: DescribeLoggingOptions
DescribeLoggingOptions.description: Retrieves the current settings of the AWS IoT Events logging options.

ListDetectorModelVersions.name: ListDetectorModelVersions
ListDetectorModelVersions.description:
Lists all the versions of a detector model. Only the metadata associated with each
                                                detector model version is returned.

ListDetectorModels.name: ListDetectorModels
ListDetectorModels.description:
Lists the detector models you have created. Only the metadata associated with each
                                                detector model is returned.

ListDetectors.name: ListDetectors
ListDetectors.description: Lists detectors (the instances of a detector model).

ListInputs.name: ListInputs
ListInputs.description: Lists the inputs you have created.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Lists the tags (metadata) which you have assigned to the resource.

PutLoggingOptions.name: PutLoggingOptions
PutLoggingOptions.description: Sets or updates the AWS IoT Events logging options.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description:
Adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata which can be
                                                used to manage a resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes the given tags (metadata) from the resource.
